name: Christina D
text: Plants look great, very healthy and full. Much better quality than the big box stores. Miss Pat was very nice and you can tell she really loves plants! She and her staff were very helpful. I will definitely shop here again!

name: Sherri L Lowery
text: Always a pleasure to stop in, say hi and see all the beautiful things. Bring a big truck, you won't leave empty handed!

name: Amy D
text: Very sweet and helpful owners. Good selection of quality plants and cute garden decor.

name: Ace Wolf
text: We make the trip from Dothan for her plants. Very nice place with great service.

name: Elaine Prather
text: Nice place, waiting on more plants to come in. Really nice place

name: James Mc
text: Ms Pat is awesome!  They have a wonderful variety of plants, shrubs, and flowers!  They also have outdoor decor and wonderful customer service!!!  I recommend Pat's to everyone!!!

name: Thomas Ray
text: Nice clean business,  Pat's friendly and helpful, highly recommend.

name: Glenn Caswell
text: Great place. Nice people. Good prices.....
